document.full_text: fleetwood mac frontman lindsey buckingham has finished work on his third solo album in six years, a project he expects to release in september and promote with a tour.
document.title: lindsey buckingham gearing up for new album, tour
lines_and_colors: fleetwood mac frontman lindsey buckingham has finished work on his third solo album in six years, a project he expects to release in september and promote with a tour.
